record.title: COSPONSORS OF S. 2716

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the Senator from Alabama, Mr. Sessions, the Senator from Texas, Mr. Cornyn, the Senator from Louisiana, Mr. Vitter, and the Senator from South Carolina, Mr. DeMint, be added as cosponsors to my bill to authorize the National Guard to provide support for the border control activities of the United States Customs and Border Protection of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes, S. 2716.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
